sect1.title: BETWEEN Operator Between Operator

row.entry: The value to find in the inclusive range.
The low value in the inclusive range.
The high value in the inclusive range.

sect1.para: The BETWEEN operator is shorthand for an inclusive range check using standard comparison operators (SeekVal >= LoVal AND SeekVal <= HiVal). It may be combined with NOT to reverse the logic.
See Also: Logical Operators, Comparison Operators
